Name: Death Road
About the game: Death Road is a solo Top Down Shooter game. Take on the challenge of liberating the earth from a zombies and monsters infestation, using over-the-top weaponry in a world with awesomely stylized graphics. The road journey has never been so much fun! Weapon Category - Machine Gun, Rockets, Shot-Gun, SMG, Sniper, Fireball, Gatling gun, Ice gun, Bolt gun and Of course Flamethrower. Story - Our world is attacked by Zombies and Monsters. Other soldier troops tried to clean the area but no one survived. A soldier stands to take the responsibility to fight against all zombies and monsters and world hope is relied on him. Mission - One Soldier to Save the World, so Kill one - Kill All, No Mercy, No Pity, No Regret.
